stories.original_summary: This Christmas, astronomers are highlighting a spectacular region of space that looks remarkably like a glowing holiday tree. stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial 'Yuletide Tree' Shines Bright in the Night Sky!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Sky-Wizards have observed a wondrous new sight in the celestial tapestry. Far beyond the reach of any griffon, a magnificent formation of newborn celestial lights now glows like a giant Yuletide tree. It fills the distant cosmic mists with sparkling enchantment, a truly magical spectacle for all.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Vast, Twirling Celestial Chain!
stories.fantasy_story: The wise Star-Sages have unveiled a colossal, swirling wonder within the cosmos! A long, thin chain of shimmering star-islands has been found, dancing in perfect unison with the mystical structure that binds them. This grand celestial ballet is a sight of immense power and mystery, far beyond common understanding.
